sys_script_include.description: The DataSilosRecordUpdate function is called by the DataSilos extension point instance class and processes a record when it is updated. Return true if the record is handled by the function, false if not.

Return true if the record is handled by the function, false if not.</description><name>DataSilosRecordUpdate</name><script><![CDATA[function DataSilosRecordUpdate(record)
